ivardefs.name: authoredOn
ivardefs.desc: Date/DateTime of creation for draft requests and date of activation for active requests.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates any plans, proposals or orders that this request is intended to satisfy - in whole or in part.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: The encounter at which the request for referral or transfer of care is initiated.

ivardefs.name: definition_
ivardefs.desc: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this request.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: The reason element gives a short description of why the referral is being made, the description expands on this to support a more complete clinical summary.

ivardefs.name: groupIdentifier
ivardefs.desc: The business identifier of the logical "grouping" request/order that this referral is a part of.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifier that uniquely identifies the referral/care transfer request instance.

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Distinguishes the "level" of authorization/demand implicit in this request.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Comments made about the referral request by any of the participants.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: An indication of the urgency of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Description of clinical condition indicating why referral/transfer of care is requested.  For example:  Pathological Anomalies, Disabled (physical or mental),  Behavioral Management.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

ivardefs.name: recipient_
ivardefs.desc: The healthcare provider(s) or provider organization(s) who/which is to receive the referral/transfer of care request.

ivardefs.name: relevantHistory_
ivardefs.desc: Links to Provenance records for past versions of this resource or fulfilling request or event resources that identify key state transitions or updates that are likely to be relevant to a user looking at the current version of the resource.

ivardefs.name: replaces_
ivardefs.desc: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

ivardefs.name: requester
ivardefs.desc: The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

ivardefs.name: serviceRequested_
ivardefs.desc: The service(s) that is/are requested to be provided to the patient.  For example: cardiac pacemaker insertion.

ivardefs.name: specialty
ivardefs.desc: Indication of the clinical domain or discipline to which the referral or transfer of care request is sent.  For example: Cardiology Gastroenterology Diabetology.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the authorization/intention reflected by the referral request record.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient who is the subject of a referral or transfer of care request.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Any additional (administrative, financial or clinical) information required to support request for referral or transfer of care.  For example: Presenting problems/chief complaints Medical History Family History Alerts Allergy/Intolerance and Adverse React

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: An indication of the type of referral (or where applicable the type of transfer of care) request.
